Company: Kindred Healthcare Inc. (Kindred Transitional Care and Rehabilitation)
Description of incident: An office burglary sometime around June 4 resulted in the theft of a safe.  The safe held tapes used for backing up Kindred data related to past, present, and prospective patients.  Diagnosis information, Social Security numbers, clinical information, bank account and other financial information, addresses, dates of birth, insurance numbers, dates that services were received from Kindred, discharge locations, daily activities, collections letters, and medications received may have been exposed.  People admitted between 2009 and 2012 may have been exposed.
